bug.author: lostmygithubaccount
bug.summary: DBFS Datastore has no return type
bug.description:
DBFS Datastore has no linked return type -> cannot easily find the methods on it <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Thanks for raising this, the documentation is being fixed and will be refreshed with the next update.
Thanks so much. We will now proceed to close this issue. You should see this doc live in 10 days. Thanks!
